title: Crush it!
dis: Crush It! is a personal workout tracking application that will allow the user to setup an account, create a workout routine by selecting from a range of exercises, and track your progress compared to previous sessions. The app was deployed on Heroku.
tech: Technologies used: JavaScript, JQuery, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, Node.js, Express, Sequelize, Handlebars

title: Food Group
dis: The application searches for a recipe and displays stores nearby using 2 APIs Edamam, and Google Places.
tech: Technologies used: JavaScript, JQuery, HTMLnpm run deplo5, CSS3, Materialize

title: MVC Tech Blog
dis: CMS-style blog site similar to a Wordpress site, where developers can publish their blog posts and comment on other developersâ€™ posts as well.
tech: Technologies used: HTML5, CSS3, Node.js, Express, Sequelize, Handlebars

title: Work Day Scheduler
dis: The application allows a user to save events for each hour of the day using moment.js.
tech: Technologies used: JavaScript, JQuery, HTML5, CSS3

title: Weather Dashboard
dis: The application retrieves the weather for the current day and a five day forecast and keeps a history of searches using moment.js and Openweathermap API.
tech: Technologies used: JavaScript, JQuery, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap
